mapper.select: SELECT m.member_id AS 'memberId', p.plan_no AS 'planNo', p.plan_name AS 'planName', p.plan_date AS 'planDate' FROM plan p INNER JOIN member_total m ON p.member_id=m.member_id WHERE m.member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT DISTINCT p.plan_name as 'planName', c.plan_no as 'planNo', c.city_route_no as 'cityRouteNo', c.city_route_date as 'cityRouteDate', c.city_route_departure_city as 'cityRouteDepartureCity', c.city_route_arrival_city as 'cityRouteArrivalCity', c.city_route_departure_time as 'cityRouteDepartureTime', c.city_route_arrival_time as 'cityRouteArrivalTime', c.city_route_memo as 'cityRouteMemo',
l.landmark_plan_no as 'landmarkPlanNo', l.landmark_info_no as 'landmarkInfoNo',
s.stay_plan_no as 'stayPlanNo', s.stay_info_no as 'stayInfoNo', s.stay_plan_time as 'stayPlanTime', s.stay_plan_memo as 'stayPlanMemo'
FROM plan p INNER JOIN city_route c INNER JOIN stay_plan s INNER JOIN landmark_plan l ON p.plan_no= c.plan_no and s.plan_no = l.plan_no WHERE p.plan_no = #{planNo};

SELECT ci.city_info_langitude as 'cityInfoLangitude', ci.city_info_latitude as 'cityInfoLatitude' FROM plan p INNER JOIN city_route cr INNER JOIN city_info ci ON p.plan_no=cr.plan_no and city_info_no=cr.city_route_departure_city WHERE p.plan_no = #{planNo};
